013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
017
018import java.util.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023
024/**
025 * information for Link object.
026 *
027 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
028 * <p class='bcode'>
029 *    <jc>// Construct using SwaggerBuilder.</jc>
030 *    Contact x = <jsm>contact</jsm>(<js>"API Support"</js>, <js>"http://www.swagger.io/support"</js>, <js>"support@swagger.io"</js>);
031 *
032 *    <jc>// Serialize using JsonSerializer.</jc>
033 *    String json = JsonSerializer.<jsf>DEFAULT</jsf>.toString(x);
034 *
035 *    <jc>// Or just use toString() which does the same as above.</jc>
036 *    String json = x.toString();
037 * </p>
038 * <p class='bcode'>
039 *    <jc>// Output</jc>
040 *    {
041 *       <js>"name"</js>: <js>"API Support"</js>,
042 *       <js>"url"</js>: <js>"http://www.swagger.io/support"</js>,
043 *       <js>"email"</js>: <js>"support@swagger.io"</js>
044 *    }
045 * </p>
046 */
047@Bean(properties="authorizationUrl,tokenUrl,refreshUrl,scopes,*")
048@FluentSetters
049public class OAuthFlow extends OpenApiElement {
050
051   private String authorizationUrl;
052   private String tokenUrl;
053   private String refreshUrl;
054   private Map<String,String> scopes;
055
056
057   /**
058    * Default constructor.
059    */
060   public OAuthFlow() {}
061
062   /**
063    * Copy constructor.
064    *
065    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
066    */
067   public OAuthFlow(OAuthFlow copyFrom) {
068      super(copyFrom);
069
070      this.authorizationUrl = copyFrom.authorizationUrl;
071      this.tokenUrl = copyFrom.tokenUrl;
072      this.refreshUrl = copyFrom.refreshUrl;
073      this.scopes = copyOf(copyFrom.scopes);
074   }
075
076   /**
077    * Make a deep copy of this object.
078    *
079    * @return A deep copy of this object.
080    */
081   public OAuthFlow copy() {
082      return new OAuthFlow(this);
083   }
084
085   /**
086    * Bean property getter:  <property>operationRef</property>.
087    *
088    * <p>
089    * The identifying name of the contact person/organization.
090    *
091    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
092    */
093   public String getAuthorizationUrl() {
094      return authorizationUrl;
095   }
096
097   /**
098    * Bean property setter:  <property>operationRef</property>.
099    *
100    * <p>
101    * The identifying name of the contact person/organization.
102    *
103    * @param value
104    *    The new value for this property.
105    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
106    * @return This object
107    */
108   public OAuthFlow setAuthorizationUrl(String value) {
109      authorizationUrl = value;
110      return this;
111   }
112
113   /**
114    * Bean property getter:  <property>description</property>.
115    *
116    * <p>
117    * The URL pointing to the contact information.
118    *
119    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
120    */
121   public String getTokenUrl() {
122      return tokenUrl;
123   }
124
125   /**
126    * Bean property setter:  <property>description</property>.
127    * @param value
128    *    The new value for this property.
129    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
130    * @return This object
131    */
132   public OAuthFlow setTokenUrl(String value) {
133      tokenUrl = value;
134      return this;
135   }
136
137   /**
138    * Bean property getter:  <property>externalValue</property>.
139    *
140    * <p>
141    * The email address of the contact person/organization.
142    *
143    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
144    */
145   public String getRefreshUrl() {
146      return refreshUrl;
147   }
148
149   /**
150    * Bean property setter:  <property>externalValue</property>.
151    *
152    * <p>
153    * The email address of the contact person/organization.
154    *
155    * @param value
156    *    The new value for this property.
157    *    <br>MUST be in the format of an email address.
158    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
159    * @return This object
160    */
161   public OAuthFlow setRefreshUrl(String value) {
162      refreshUrl = value;
163      return this;
164   }
165
166   /**
167    * Bean property getter:  <property>examples</property>.
168    *
169    * <p>
170    * An example of the response message.
171    *
172    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
173    */
174   public Map<String,String> getScopes() {
175      return scopes;
176   }
177
178   /**
179    * Bean property setter:  <property>examples</property>.
180    *
181    * <p>
182    * An example of the response message.
183    *
184    * @param value
185    *    The new value for this property.
186    *    <br>Keys must be MIME-type strings.
187    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
188    * @return This object
189    */
190   public OAuthFlow setScopes(Map<String,String> value) {
191      scopes = copyOf(value);
192      return this;
193   }
194
195   /**
196    * Adds a single value to the <property>examples</property> property.
197    *
198    * @param name The mime-type string.
199    * @param description The example.
200    * @return This object
201    */
202   public OAuthFlow addScope(String name, String description) {
203      scopes = mapBuilder(scopes).sparse().add(name, description).build();
204      return this;
205   }
206
207   // <FluentSetters>
208
209   // </FluentSetters>
210
211   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
212   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
213      if (property == null)
214         return null;
215      return switch (property) {
216         case "refreshUrl" -> toType(getRefreshUrl(), type);
217         case "tokenUrl" -> toType(getTokenUrl(), type);
218         case "authorizationUrl" -> toType(getAuthorizationUrl(), type);
219         case "scopes" -> toType(getScopes(), type);
220         default -> super.get(property, type);
221      };
222   }
223
224   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
225   public OAuthFlow set(String property, Object value) {
226      if (property == null)
227         return this;
228      return switch (property) {
229         case "authorizationUrl" -> setAuthorizationUrl(Utils.s(value));
230         case "tokenUrl" -> setTokenUrl(Utils.s(value));
231         case "refreshUrl" -> setRefreshUrl(Utils.s(value));
232         case "scopes" -> setScopes(mapBuilder(String.class,String.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
233         default -> {
234            super.set(property, value);
235            yield this;
236         }
237      };
238   }
239
240   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
241   public Set<String> keySet() {
242      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
243         .addIf(authorizationUrl != null, "authorizationUrl")
244         .addIf(tokenUrl != null, "tokenUrl")
245         .addIf(refreshUrl != null, "refreshUrl")
246         .addIf(scopes != null, "scopes")
247         .build();
248      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
249   }
250}
